step_feedback.feedback: Great job starting with your fists closed and arms in front of your chest. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles here.
Excellent! You opened your fingers and extended your arms horizontally to shoulder height. Make sure to exhale and relax your muscles as you do this.
Good work on opening your fingers and extending your arms. Focus on a full exhale and complete muscle relaxation during this phase.
You're doing well with the outward arm movement. Ensure your wrists are relaxed and your fingers are fully open as you extend.
Fantastic! You completed the exercise with good form. Keep practicing the smooth outward motion and relaxed muscle release.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles when bringing your arms in, then exhale and relax as you extend them outwards. Keep up the good work!
